recipe.title: Grilled Fajita Skewers Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; shrimp, deveined and peeled with the tail on ; (455 g)
3 tablespoons ; garlic powder, 1 tablespoon per protein
3 tablespoons ; chili powder, 1 tablespoon per protein

steps.step: Slice onion in quarters, and bell peppers in 1.5" (4cm) squares.
Place each meat in a gallon sized plastic bag and cover with dry ingredients. Close the bag and shake until evenly coated.
Prepare skewers by layering onion, bell pepper, and protein. (Be sure not to mix proteins on the same skewer, as they have different cook times.)
Grill the skewers over medium-high heat, flipping once, until the protein’s internal temperatures are as follows: Steak - 155ºF (70ºC), Chicken - 165ºF (75ºC), Shrimp - 145ºF (65ºC).

steps_updated.steps_updated: Slice onion in quarters, and bell peppers in 1.5" (4cm) squares.
Place each meat in a gallon sized plastic bag and cover with dry ingredients.
Close the bag and shake until evenly coated.
Prepare skewers by layering onion, bell pepper, and protein.
(Be sure not to mix proteins on the same skewer, as they have different cook times.)
Grill the skewers over medium-high heat, flipping once, until the protein’s internal temperatures are as follows: Steak - 155ºF (70ºC), Chicken - 165ºF (75ºC), Shrimp - 145ºF (65ºC).
